amendment.description: To direct funds to construct radiological laboratories at the Pacific Northwest National Laboratory.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4640 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4640 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S7470-7472; text: CR S7470) To direct funds to construct radiological laboratories at the Pacific Northwest National Laboratory.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4640 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4640 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Murray.
